title: Pixel 3a running Android 11. Bluetooth not working to connect with vehicle (Lexus) or with Fitbit
content:
I have a Pixel 3a. Worked great until a few weeks ago.  Now, the bluetooth no longer connects with my vehicle (2018 Lexus NX) or Fitbit.

I tried with my work iphone and it connected fine by bluetooth.

Have restarted the phone, erased network settings, unpaired devices, and nothing works.

Has anyone else or Google posted a solution  to this problem?  I suspect it was caused by Android 11 update to phone.
